# HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatArray

**Global Variable**

Indicates that the characteristic has array values.

## Declaration

```swift
let HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatArray: String
```

## Collections

- **HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatDictionary**: Indicates that the characteristic has dictionary values.

items.description: Indicates that the characteristic has dictionary values.
items.name: HMCharacteristicMetadataFormatDictionary
